nodes.text: Command Decision was a short story written by Timothy Zahn, originally published in Star Wars Adventure Journal 11 by West End Games in November 1996 and later archived online at Hyperspace.

The story begins with Admiral Thrawn, Commander Parck, and Captain Dagon Niriz in the Unknown Regions aboard the Imperial I-class Star Destroyer Admonitor. While posing as a colony ship, they encounter an alien convoy of the Ebruchi, led by an enigmatic alien named Creysis.
